abstract: A look around the nation at the day's best in college football from Week 6.
snippet: A look around the nation at the day's best in college football from Week 6.
lead_paragraph: COLTON CHAPPLE The Harvard quarterback threw for 414 yards and 4 touchdowns as the Crimson won, 41-31, at Cornell (2-2, 0-2 Ivy League). Chapple led three scoring drives in the second half, completing touchdown passes of 42, 27 and 26 yards to put the game out of reach. It was the first 400-yard passing game since 2003 for Harvard (3-1, 2-0).

headline.main: The Day's Best in College Football
